Magick Options

Source: R/options.R
options.Rd

List option types and values supported in your version of ImageMagick. For descriptions see ImageMagick Enumerations.

magick_options()

option_types()

filter_types()

metric_types()

dispose_types()

compose_types()

colorspace_types()

channel_types()

image_types()

kernel_types()

noise_types()

gravity_types()

orientation_types()

morphology_types()
